description: This file implements functions for managing the state of a Sys Repository Driver Object, including getting/setting properties, resetting properties and initializing object state. It appears to be part of a larger system for managing system repository states and objects.

classes.name: PSYS_REPOSITORY_DRIVER_OBJECT
classes.description: Structure representing the Sys Repository Driver Object, containing properties like hRootFolder and other driver-specific data.

classes.name: PSYS_REPOSITORY_DRIVER_PROPERTY
classes.description: Structure holding property data for the repository driver, including DriverName.

classes.name: PSYS_REPOSITORY_FOLDER_OBJECT
classes.description: Object representing a folder in the system repository, with a method to reset its state.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRdoGetRootFolder(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the root folder object of the repository driver.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoGetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Retrieves the current property settings of the repository driver object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoSetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Sets or updates the property settings of the repository driver object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoResetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the repository driver properties to default values.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRdoReset(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the entire object state, specifically resetting the root folder's state.
